narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this inspection. An inspection focused on the animals and the facilities was 
conducted. The facility representative reports that they discontinued doing regulated activity at the end of 2023 and no 
longer house a regulated species. The focused inspection verified that information.  
 
The licensee could not be reached for an exit interview.
